alert.note: Alert for Rota (Marianas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued October 10 at 10:24PM ChST until October 11 at 7:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Guam, Rota, Saipan and Tinian. * WHEN...Through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Typhoon Bolaven is now west of Tinian and Saipan and moving northwest. Heavy rain is expected through tonight and into Wednesday, especially across Tinian and Saipan. Rain amount across Guam have been between 4 to 7.5 inches over the last 24 hours. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
